content: GlimmerTV holds exclusive streaming rights for 'Skyward Dreams' until 2026, renew option for 2 years.
'Island Quest' final episodes syndicated to 10 international channels post-finale.
metadata: Syndication window: 2025-05 to 2026-04, partial revenue share

content: 'Midnight Cargo' theatrical distribution in North America only. Negotiating overseas deals.
'Fuzzy Friends' Season 1 & 2 DVD rights licensed to KidVid Home Entertainment.
metadata: Expires 2027, no streaming exclusivity, region: US/Canada

content: 'Cityscapes' streaming tie-in with GlimmerTV, brand sponsor EarthBuild. Episodes can appear on free ad-supported channels after 2025.
metadata: Duration: 3 years, possible extension if docu hits view target
